entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
